definition: to receive/to accept/to suffer/subjected to/to bear/to stand/pleasant/(passive marker)
essence/extract/vitality/energy/semen/sperm/mythical goblin spirit/highly perfected/elite/the pick of sth/proficient (refined ability)/extremely (fine)/selected rice (archaic)

sentences.english: Number of donor which had unfertilized eggs.
sentences.chinese: 具有未受精卵之供胚頭數。

sentences.english: Our cells are actually copies of zygote.
sentences.chinese: 我們的細胞，其實是受精卵的複製。
每隻貓接受30到50個受精卵。

sentences.english: It's like a 90 year old listening to a zygote.
sentences.chinese: 就像讓一個90歲的人聽受精卵的話。

sentences.english: It’s the father’s sperm which determines whether the fertilized egg will develop into a boy or a girl.
sentences.chinese: 正是男性的精子決定受精卵發育成男孩或女孩。

sentences.english: The subject is the effect on the ability of embryos to attach to the uterus.
sentences.chinese: 研究的主題是BPA對於受精卵在子宮着牀的影響。

sentences.english: That would be the implantation of the fertilized egg into the woman's uterus.
sentences.chinese: 着牀就是受精卵進入了婦女的子宮。

sentences.english: After all, every of our cells is zygote.
sentences.chinese: 總之，每一個細胞都是受精卵。

sentences.english: Non-identical twins are the result of two fertilised eggs implanting in the uterus at the same time.
sentences.chinese: 非同卵雙生子是兩個受精卵同時在子宮內着牀的結果。

sentences.english: But why should a molecule found on fertilized eggs release such fury?
sentences.chinese: 但是爲什麼受精卵上的分子可以造成如此的憤怒。

sentences.english: He oxygenates the eggs by fanning them with his pectoral fins.
sentences.chinese: 他以扇動胸鰭的方式來爲受精卵供氧。

sentences.english: Such embryos are often termed embryoids, to distinguish them from embryos formed from zygotes .
sentences.chinese: 通常稱作胚狀體，以區別由受精卵發育而來的胚胎。

sentences.english: Syngamy - The fusion of egg and sperm cells into a zygote.
sentences.chinese: 融合卵和精子細胞成受精卵。

sentences.english: So a fertilized egg is an example of totipotency .
sentences.chinese: 受精卵就是一個全能細胞的例子。

definition: cleavage of fertilized ovum into cells
